original_title: Sri Lanka rupee close at 296.50/298 to dollar, bond yields mixed
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka rupee closed weaker at 296.50/298.00 rupees and the bonds were mixed while t-bills were down on Friday, dealers said.
The Spot US dollar closed at 294.0/295.50 rupees rupees on Thursday.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 closed at 23.20/35 percent, down from 23.40/60 percent a day earlier.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 closed at 24.40/70 percent up from 24.15/25.30 percent from yesterday.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2025 closed at 25.75/26.00. percent, down from 26.75/27.00 percent on Thursday.
A three-month maturing billclosed at 22.25/30 percent, down from 22.75/23.00 percent from the last close.
A six-month maturing bill closed at 20.00/75 percent down from 21.00/30 percent from its last close.
A one-year bill closed at 18.25/75 percent down from 18.30/75 percent from its last close.
